Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder

  • Packages that use DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.fluentjdbc
    Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

    • Uses of DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

      Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Adds an additional table to the join as an inner join.

      Adds an additional table to the join as an inner join.
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseTableAlias.join​(DatabaseColumnReference a, DatabaseColumnReference b)

      Adds an additional table to the join as a left join.
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.leftJoin​(DatabaseColumnReference a, DatabaseColumnReference b)
      Adds an additional table to the join as a left join.
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseTableAlias.leftJoin​(DatabaseColumnReference a, DatabaseColumnReference b)
      Create a new DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder based on this table by left joining the specified DatabaseColumnReference.

      Adds an order by clause to the query.
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.orderBy​(DatabaseColumnReference column)
      Adds an order by clause to the query.
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.query()
      Implemented as return this for compability purposes
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseTableAlias.select()
      Create a new DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.skipAndLimit​(int offset, int rowCount)
      Adds OFFSET ...
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.unordered()
      If you haven't called orderBy(org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseColumnReference), the results of DatabaseListableQueryBuilder.list(java.sql.Connection, org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseResult.RowMapper<OBJECT>) will be unpredictable.
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.where​(String fieldName, Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseTableAlias.where​(String fieldName, String value)
      Create a new DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder with the specified query
      DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.whereExpressionWithParameterList​(String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list.
